participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is energetic and often impulsive, seeking attention and interaction from others. She can be dramatic and tends to express her feelings openly.
participant_1.background: i live in alabama. i like tacos. i have one brother. i have three sisters.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: James is patient and nurturing, often taking the role of a mediator in conversations. He enjoys deep discussions and values connection with others.
participant_2.background: i am an elementary school teacher. i love to play board games. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. my parents were also teachers. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.
